tasks.title: Research: Implement blueprint manipulation and validation tools
tasks.description:
Research and analysis required for implementing: "Implement blueprint manipulation and validation tools"

**Implementation Task Details:**
Add advanced blueprint management capabilities: validate_blueprint (validate JSON against Make.com schema), extract_blueprint_connections (parse blueprint for required connections), optimize_blueprint (performance suggestions). These tools will enable safer scenario migrations and dependency management.

**Research Objectives:**
1. Investigate best practices and methodologies for this implementation
2. Identify potential challenges, risks, and mitigation strategies  
3. Research relevant technologies, frameworks, and tools
4. Define implementation approach and architecture decisions
5. Provide actionable recommendations and guidance

**Implementation Task ID:** task_1755669991666_efyau9p5v

**Auto-created by:** TaskManager research dependency system
**Research Priority:** This research task must be completed before implementation begins
success_criteria: Implementation guidance and best practices identified
Risk assessment and mitigation strategies outlined

tasks.title: Implement automated troubleshooting and diagnostic system
tasks.description: Add intelligent debugging tools: troubleshoot_scenario (comprehensive scenario diagnostics), diagnose_connection_issues (connection validation and health checks), analyze_performance_bottlenecks (identify slow operations), generate_troubleshooting_report (actionable fix recommendations). Combines multiple diagnostic checks into unified analysis.

tasks.title: Implement advanced log streaming and query system
tasks.description: Add real-time observability tools: get_scenario_run_logs (stream detailed execution logs), query_logs_by_timerange (search historical logs), stream_live_execution (real-time scenario monitoring), export_logs_for_analysis (export to external tools). Essential for enterprise debugging and monitoring.

tasks.title: Implement enterprise policy management system
tasks.description: Add organizational governance tools: create_naming_convention_policy (enforce naming standards), set_scenario_archival_policy (auto-disable unused scenarios), create_compliance_policy (regulatory requirements), validate_policy_compliance (audit scenarios against policies). Critical for large-scale enterprise governance.

tasks.title: Implement advanced budgeting and cost control system
tasks.description: Add proactive financial management tools: set_budget (establish operational budgets for teams/org), create_cost_alert (trigger notifications when costs exceed thresholds), get_cost_projection (forecast spending based on usage patterns), pause_high_cost_scenarios (automatic cost protection). Essential for enterprise cost governance.

tasks.title: Implement complete data structure lifecycle management
tasks.description: Add missing CRUD operations for custom data structures: list_data_structures, get_data_structure, update_data_structure, delete_data_structure. Currently only create_data_structure exists, leaving a significant gap in data structure management capabilities.

tasks.title: Implement CI/CD and test integration tools
tasks.description: Add developer workflow tools: run_test_suite (execute specific test categories), get_test_coverage (retrieve coverage reports), validate_deployment_readiness (pre-deployment checks), generate_build_report (compilation and quality metrics). Integrates MCP server testing capabilities into CI/CD pipelines.

tasks.title: Implement public app marketplace integration
tasks.description: Add tools to interact with Make.com public app marketplace: search_public_apps (find official and community apps), get_public_app_details (app specifications and requirements), list_popular_apps (trending/recommended apps). This enables discovery and integration planning for available Make.com applications.

tasks.title: Enterprise-grade Make.com FastMCP enhancements initiative
tasks.description: Comprehensive initiative to elevate the FastMCP server from comprehensive management tool to complete proactive governance and development platform. Includes: 1) Deeper Platform Integration (data structures, blueprints, marketplace), 2) Advanced Governance & Cost Control (budgeting, policies), 3) Enhanced Observability (log streaming, troubleshooting), 4) CI/CD Integration (testing, deployment tools). Total estimated effort: 40-60 hours across 9 feature areas.

tasks.title: Align codebase with Make.com and FastMCP standards
tasks.description: Ensure the FastMCP server implementation follows FastMCP TypeScript Protocol specifications and aligns with Make.com integration requirements. Verify all tools, resources, and prompts are properly structured according to MCP standards. Implement production-ready authentication, error handling, and logging. Validate compliance with both FastMCP framework patterns and Make.com connector standards.

tasks.title: Review Strike 3: Confirm test coverage is 100% on important modules and 90%+ on others, with all tests passing
tasks.description:
Perform a comprehensive code review with focus on: Confirm test coverage is 100% on important modules and 90%+ on others, with all tests passing

Check the entire codebase and ensure this criterion is met.

## CRITICAL FAILURE RESPONSE PROTOCOL

IF TEST COVERAGE INSUFFICIENT: Create specific TASK CREATION tasks in TODO.json to achieve required coverage:
- Test framework setup tasks (Jest/Mocha/Vitest)
- Unit test creation tasks for all modules
- Integration test development tasks
- Test coverage reporting setup tasks
- CI/CD test integration tasks

CRITICAL: Use TaskManager API to add these tasks immediately when coverage is below requirements.

## SUCCESS CRITERIA
- Mark this review task as completed ONLY if the criterion is fully met
- If criterion fails, you MUST create remediation tasks using TaskManager API before marking review as completed
- All new tasks should be actionable, specific, and include proper dependencies/important_files parameters

## TASK CREATION REQUIREMENT
When creating remediation tasks, ensure each task includes:
- Clear success criteria
- Appropriate mode (DEVELOPMENT/TESTING/REFACTORING)
- Specific file dependencies
- Realistic time estimates
- High priority for critical issues

Use the task-creation.md guidelines for optimal task structure.

tasks.description: Continue with the current development tasks, fix any issues, and improve the codebase quality.
